feed.title: Worldwide Newton Conference
feed.subtitle: A sporadically annual gathering of Newton aficionados.

entry.title: Announcing The Worldwide Newton Conference 2007
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that the next Worldwide Newton Conference will be held in Tokyo, Japan. Scheduled for July 7 - 8, 2007, this is an event where Newton users, people interested in Newton technology and those in related fields can gather for lectures, workshops, exchange of information and casual chats. We hope that many people attend and get involved with this year's WWNC.
entry.content: We are pleased to announce that the next Worldwide Newton Conference will be held in Tokyo, Japan. Scheduled for July 7 - 8, 2007, this is an event where Newton users, people interested in Newton technology and those in related fields can gather for lectures, workshops, exchange of information and casual chats. We hope that many people attend and get involved with this year’s WWNC. This event is sponsor by the WWNC 2007 executive committee and the Worldwide Newton Association in partnership with Newton Gravity and Newton Japan.

entry.title: More WWNC Presentations Available on YouTube
entry.summary: The indubitable Sir Izaac has posted several more video snippets from the 2006 Worldwide Newton Conference featuring presentations from Paul Guyot and Walter Smith. A full list of current videos can be found on the resources page.
entry.content: The indubitable Sir Izaac has posted several more video snippets from the 2006 Worldwide Newton Conference featuring presentations from Paul Guyot and Walter Smith. A full list of current videos can be found on the resources page.
